data.title: Baseball Articles
data.text:
Season of Infamy: Are the 2024 White Sox Really the Worst Team in MLB History?

Opening Day brings hope for all baseball teams, but that evaporated quickly for the 2024 White Sox. Some say they’re the worst team in MLB history. We’re digging into the…

The Longest Winning and Losing Streaks in MLB History

In recent seasons, it's felt as if there have been a series of record-setting winning and losing streaks. Here are the longest in MLB history.

Early Returns: Which MLB Trade Deadline Moves Have Had an Immediate Impact?

For a lot of people in baseball, the biggest story of the 2024 MLB trade deadline was all the potential impact players who did not get traded. Tarik Skubal stayed…

Leveling the Playing Field: What if Negro League Stars Played 162-Game Seasons?

While some former Negro League stars who eventually played in MLB have been recognized by baseball fans for decades, others are finally receiving the attention they deserve. But where would they…

The Most Cycles in a Season, Career and More in MLB History

We're celebrating the cycle by breaking down the record-holding hitters in several of the different ways the feat can be accomplished.

Lights Out: How the Bullpen Is Lifting the Surprising Guardians to Elite Status

How is Cleveland is so good with a middle-of-the-pack offense and a less-than mediocre rotation? It’s all about the Guardians’ bullpen. It might seem like a surprise to some, but…
